resources.string: Please enter your e-mail and password to login to your account
Hi Ahmed\nYour Last Login was on 15/09/2022 13:25:09

- Click "Start" Button to go to shoe list screen.

- You can click the floating button to add new shoe.

- Then in shoe detail screen you add new shoe data like name, company, description & size and save it.

- You will notice 3 dots icon in the appbar which contain "Logout" button.
